description: "This mid-18th century map shows the island of Sumatra and the Malay Peninsula, divided by the Straits of Malacca. A note in French at the top right corner states that the interior of Sumatra and the course of its rivers are unknown."
label: "Partie de L'inde au delà du gange [cartographic material] : Presqv-Isle de L'inde au delà du gange / par le sr. Sanson d'Abbeville, geographe du roy avec privilege pour 20 ans, 1652."
